statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

article.headline: Hofstra 75, Delaware 50
article.story: HEMPSTEAD, N.Y. (AP) -- Antoine Aguido scored 23 points and sophomore reserve Chris Gadley had career-highs of 15 points and 13 rebounds to lead Hofstra to a 75-50 victory over Delaware on Saturday. Zygis Sestokas had 12 points and Loren Stokes added 10 for the Pride (10-4, 3-0 Colonial Athletic Association), who won their fourth straight and 10 of 11 with the only loss coming at Syracuse. Herb Courtney had 17 points on 6-for-18 shooting and blocked five shots for the Blue Hens (2-12, 0-3), who lost their third straight. Calvin Cannon added 13 points for Delaware. Aguido scored six points in the 10-0 run that gave Hofstra a 13-4 lead after 4½ minutes. The Pride scored the first seven points of the second half to go up 42-24. Gadley's previous highs were eight points and 11 rebounds. Hofstra extended its regular-season home winning streak to 23 games, dating to a 2004-05 loss to Old Dominion, which visits the Pride on Monday.
